original: @167b # // rgya gar skad du ;
analyzed: @167b # // rgya gar skad du ;
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bh'a ba sam kr'an ta pa ri ka th'a /
analyzed: bh'a ba sam kr'an ta pa ri ka th'a /
translated: BhavasamkrantiparikathƒÅ

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: srid pa las 'das pa'i gtam /
analyzed: srid pa las 'das pa'i gtam /
translated: The Discourse on Transcending Existence

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: dngos med dngos las mi skye ste //
analyzed: dngos med dngos las mi skye ste //
translated: Non-entities do not arise from entities,

original: dngos med las kyang skye ma yin //
analyzed: dngos med las kyang skye ma yin //
translated: Nor do they arise from non-entities.

original: dngos po rtag tu skye ba ste //
analyzed: dngos po rtag tu skye ba ste //
translated: Entities always arise,

original: dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
analyzed: dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
translated: But are like sky-flowers in reality.

original: mkha' dang 'dra ba'i chos yod na //
analyzed: mkha' dang 'dra ba'i chos yod na //
translated: When phenomena exist like space,

original: gzhan ni mkha' dang 'dra ba skye //
analyzed: gzhan ni mkha' dang 'dra ba skye //
translated: Others arise like space.

original: brten nas thams cad mkha' dang 'dra //
analyzed: brten nas thams cad mkha' dang 'dra //
translated: Everything is dependent, like space.

original: de nas srid pa med pa can //
analyzed: de nas srid pa med pa can //
translated: Then, without existence,

original: ngo bo nyid kyis las med cing //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis las med cing //
translated: There is no action by nature,

original: rgyu med 'bras bu yod ma yin //
analyzed: rgyu med 'bras bu yod ma yin //
translated: And without cause, there is no effect.

original: 'di dag thams cad med pa ste //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad med pa ste //
translated: All of this is non-existent,

original: 'jig rten pa med 'jig pa med //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa med 'jig pa med //
translated: Without worldly existence or destruction.

original: ma skyes pa yi dngos po gang //
analyzed: ma skyes pa yi dngos po gang //
translated: How could a non-arisen entity

original: ji ltar gzhan zhig skyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan zhig skyed par 'gyur //
translated: Ever give rise to another?

original: 'jig rten dang por ma byung ste //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang por ma byung ste //
translated: The world did not occur in the beginning,

original: 'ga' zhig gis kyang sprul pa min //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis kyang sprul pa min //
translated: And it is not emanated by anyone.

original: zla ba seng ge'i grong khyer bzhin //
analyzed: zla ba seng ge'i grong khyer bzhin //
translated: Like the city of the gandharvas.

original: 'jig rten don med gyi na 'khyams //
analyzed: 'jig rten don med gyi na 'khyams //
translated: The world wanders aimlessly.

original: 'jig rten rnam par rtog las 'byung //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnam par rtog las 'byung //
translated: The world arises from conceptualization.

original: rnam rtog sems las yang dag 'byung ;
analyzed: rnam rtog sems las yang dag 'byung ;
translated: Conceptualization arises from the mind.

original: / sems ni lus la brten pa ste //
analyzed: / sems ni lus la brten pa ste //
translated: The mind is based on the body.

original: de phyir lus ni rnam dpyad do //
analyzed: de phyir lus ni rnam dpyad do //
translated: Therefore, the body is to be examined.

original: gzugs ni stong pa tshor ba rang bzhin med //üîΩ'du shes med de 'du byed yod ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs ni stong pa tshor ba rang bzhin med // 'du shes med de 'du byed yod ma yin //
translated: Form is empty; feeling has no intrinsic nature.üîΩPerception does not exist; volitional factors do not exist.

original: 'byung ba spangs nas sems dad sems byung med //
analyzed: 'byung ba spangs nas sems dad sems byung med //
translated: Apart from the elements, there is no mind or mental factors.

original: de phyir lus ni rtog bral ngo bo yin //
analyzed: de phyir lus ni rtog bral ngo bo yin //
translated: Therefore, the body is the nature free from conceptualization.

original: sems med chos rnams de dag med ;
analyzed: sems med chos rnams de dag med ;
translated: Those phenomena that are without mind do not exist.

original: / lus med khams rnams yod ma yin //
analyzed: / lus med khams rnams yod ma yin //
translated: The elements that are without a body do not exist.

original: gnyis su med pa'i las 'di ni //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i las 'di ni //
translated: This nondual action

original: de nyid rig pa rnams gyis bstan //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa rnams gyis bstan //
translated: is taught by those who know reality.

original: 'di dag thams cad dmigs med par //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad dmigs med par //
translated: All of these are without reference

original: gnyis su med par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis su med par bstan pa yin //
translated: and are taught to be nondual.

original: blo ni dmigs pa med byas nas //
analyzed: blo ni dmigs pa med byas nas //
translated: Having made the mind without reference,

original: dmigs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dmigs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: it will arise without reference.

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus ;
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus ;
translated: Generosity, discipline, patience, diligence,

original: / bsam gtan la sogs brten byas nas //
analyzed: / bsam gtan la sogs brten byas nas //
translated: Relying on the concentrations and so forth,

original: yun mi ring ba'i dus kyis ni //
analyzed: yun mi ring ba'i dus kyis ni //
translated: In a short time,

original: byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: I will attain the highest enlightenment.

original: thabs dang shes rab la gnas te //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab la gnas te //
translated: Relying on means and wisdom,

original: sems can rnams la brtse par bya //üîΩmyur ba kho nar thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: sems can rnams la brtse par bya // myur ba kho nar thams cad mkhyen //
translated: I will have compassion for sentient beings.üîΩ There is no doubt that I will quickly attain

original: thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med //üîΩ'di dag thams @168a * //
analyzed: thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med // 'di dag thams @168a * //
translated: The state of omniscience.üîΩ All of these are mere names,

original: cad ming tsam ste //üîΩ'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: cad ming tsam ste // 'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas //
translated: Mere designations.

original: rjod par byed las tha dad pa'i //
analyzed: rjod par byed las tha dad pa'i //
translated: Apart from the one who expresses,

original: brjod par bya ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba yod ma yin //
translated: There is no object of expression.

original: chos rnams thams cad ming med de //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad ming med de //
translated: All phenomena are nameless,

original: bdag med par yang yongs su gsal //
analyzed: bdag med par yang yongs su gsal //
translated: Clearly manifest without a self.

original: yang dag min pa'i chos 'di dag / rnam par rtog bas kun nas bslang //üîΩgang gis stong pa zhes brtags pa'i //
analyzed: yang dag min pa'i chos 'di dag / rnam par rtog bas kun nas bslang // gang gis stong pa zhes brtags pa'i //
translated: These unreal phenomena are motivated by conceptualization.üîΩ  The conceptualization that conceptualizes emptiness

original: rtog pa de yang 'dis stong ngo //
analyzed: rtog pa de yang 'dis stong ngo //
translated: Is also empty of itself.

original: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar ni //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar ni //
translated: The eye sees forms,

original: de nyid gsungs pas gang bshad pa //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pas gang bshad pa //
translated: As was explained by the Teacher himself.

original: log par zhen pa'i 'jig rten la //
analyzed: log par zhen pa'i 'jig rten la //
translated: In the world of mistaken attachment,üîΩ  The eye is said to be the seer.

original: kun rdzob bden par brjod pa yin //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden par brjod pa yin //
translated: Are said to be conventional truths.

original: gang du tshogs bar mthong ba ni //
analyzed: gang du tshogs bar mthong ba ni //
translated: Where the assembly is seen,

original: 'dren pas ston par byed pa yin //üîΩblo dang ldan pas don dam gyi //
analyzed: 'dren pas ston par byed pa yin // blo dang ldan pas don dam gyi //
translated: The Guide teaches.üîΩThe wise one teaches that stage

original: nye bar brtags pa'i sa de gsungs //
analyzed: nye bar brtags pa'i sa de gsungs //
translated: That is examined as ultimate.

original: mig gis gzugs ni mi mthong ste //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs ni mi mthong ste //
translated: The eye does not see forms,

original: yid kyis chos rnams mi rig go //
analyzed: yid kyis chos rnams mi rig go //
translated: The mind does not cognize phenomena.

original: 'jig rten pa yi yul min gang //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi yul min gang //
translated: That which is not the object of the world,

original: 'di ni mchog tu bden pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog tu bden pa'o //
translated: This is the highest truth.

original: mig med gzugs kyang yod min zhing //
analyzed: mig med gzugs kyang yod min zhing //
translated: Where there is no eye, there are no forms,

original: snang ba yid la byed pa med //
analyzed: snang ba yid la byed pa med //
translated: No illumination, no mental activity.

original: sems ni rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul //
analyzed: sems ni rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul //
translated: The mind is deluded like a dream,

original: thams cad yod min med pa 'ang min //
analyzed: thams cad yod min med pa 'ang min //
translated: All is neither existent nor non-existent.

original: srid pa las 'das pa'i gtam slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: srid pa las 'das pa'i gtam slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The discourse on transcending existence is complete.

original: // / kha che'i pandi ta shr'i ra tha dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / kha che'i pandi ta shr'i ra tha dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: By the Kashmiri pandit Shri-ra and the translator-monk Drak-or Sherab.
